entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
